author: Brian Turner
method: In a bowl, whisk together the double cream, coconut cream, icing sugar and eggs. Dip the brioche slices into the mixture to completely coat.  Melt the butter in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add the brioche and fry for two minutes on each side, or until golden.  To serve, place the brioche slices onto a plate and dust with icing sugar.
ingredients: 100ml/3½oz double cream,  100ml/3½oz coconut cream,  2 tbsp icing sugar,  2 free-range eggs,  3 slices ready-made brioche,  50g/1¾oz unsalted butter,  icing sugar to dust
